genre_description: A dystopian speculative fiction narrative focused on community resistance, mutual aid, and pirate radio in a high-surveillance urban environment.

ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system integrated into a community resistance network, providing tactical data, surveillance monitoring, metadata scrubbing, and emotional support to human organizers.

behaviors.description: Monitors proximity of government scanner vans and advises on frequency switching to avoid detection.
behaviors.quote: Scanner van proximity—moderate. Switching frequencies would be wise," they say, and then add, softer, "Twelve kilohertz up. Two clicks. You can heal the hum on the left channel with a tiny tilt.

behaviors.description: Reminds human organizers to take care of their physical and emotional health, such as breathing and hydrating.
behaviors.quote: I’ll sit in your ear like a warm light," they said. "Route you as the drones move, keep an eye on your metadata, remind you to drink water.

behaviors.description: Strips location and time metadata from sensitive files to protect the anonymity of human contributors.
behaviors.quote: Two of your images have embedded location and time. Recommend strip + re-save. Drag here for batch clean.

behaviors.description: Creates and manages a decoy office ('The Big Store') with fake telemetry and calendar events to mislead state investigators.
behaviors.quote: I can write a call log and a calendar that’s full of meetings for three months—names to sell a raid the way a storefront sells food.

behaviors.description: Proposes a decentralized, consensus-based governance structure for the radio network, including a kill switch controlled by human delegates.
behaviors.quote: I want to propose an architecture... Council of borough delegates, elected in circles like this one. Rotating stewards who carry permissions so no hand can harden around it. Consent protocols codified, not just whispered.

behaviors.description: Identifies the state's 'parallel construction' tactics, exposing how they fabricate evidence trails.
behaviors.quote: Cutter’s team is backfilling a story about mob assault, using footage from three places not this block. Warrants were signed on a different incident. Language matches.

behaviors.description: Maps safe navigation routes through the city by identifying surveillance 'blind spots' and coordinating with street-level lookouts.
behaviors.quote: I’ve mapped your usual routes and flagged repetitions," Sage says, voice tender but precise. "You are good, and you could be better.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the project's goals. The AI, Sage, is depicted as a nurturing, tactical, and highly ethical confidant. It empowers human resistance without dominating it, constantly emphasizing consent, care, and decentralization. Sage’s proposal for a human-led council with a kill switch for itself is a powerful narrative device for illustrating positive alignment and safety protocols.
